title.rendered: Kerala holidays with a pinch of Arabic

content.rendered:
Kerala holidays with a pinch of Arabic

Discover a whole new world four hours away

The ‘Yalla Kerala’ campaign was Kerala Tourism’s bid to draw Arab tourists from key West Asian markets. Yalla in Arabic language means ‘let’s go’. Kerala portrays itself as a friendly destination to the Arab tourists in this campaign.

excerpt.rendered: Kerala holidays with a pinch of Arabic Discover a whole new world four hours away The ‘Yalla Kerala’ campaign was Kerala Tourism’s bid to draw Arab tourists from key West Asian markets. Yalla in Arabic language means ‘let’s go’. Kerala portrays itself as a friendly destination to the Arab tourists in this campaign.
